name: Stream Arenas
description:
Stream Arenas is only played on Twitch




Stream Arenas is an interactive Twitch game where you transform your Twitch chat into fierce Chatiators! Go head to head with the community and battle your way to the top of each Season to be the ultimate Chatiator! Fight your opponents using a multitude of characters with unique special moves in a variety of different arenas.
Spawn vicious monsters into the arena to add even more danger! Killing these enemies award points and special abilities like, speed boost, full heals, and extra powers!

Features

  • Highly Interactive Twitch Game!
  • Trigger random match events with Bits!
  • Lots of Characters to play!
  • Unique ults for each Character!
  • Seasonal Champions and Themes!
  • Competitive fun on Stream!
